title: Gazebo issues on Sourceforge playerstage issue tracker

content.raw: There are still a bunch of issues open for Gazebo on the Player issue tracker on Sourceforge from back when Gazebo was hosted there.  I'm trying to do some bug triage and make sure there are no outstanding issues before releasing Player 3.1, and I'm wondering what to do with the bugs that are still around for Gazebo.  Should I just mass close them all with a note to re-open on this issue tracker?  Do you guys want to go through them yourselves and make sure there's nothing still relevant there?
content.html: There are still a bunch of issues open for Gazebo on the Player issue tracker on Sourceforge from back when Gazebo was hosted there. Should I just mass close them all with a note to re-open on this issue tracker? Do you guys want to go through them yourselves and make sure there's nothing still relevant there?
